name: 5 Steps From Home
description:
Step 1 (level 1) for the 5 devs make 1 game youtube collaboration. 

You have crash landed on an alien planet and your rocket ship is scattered into pieces. You must collect the missing pieces of your ship to take another step closer to home.  Be careful, danger lies around every corner. 

Do you have what it takes to beat the game and take all 5 steps home?

Next Steps:

Step 2: https://tobyrcod.itch.io/5-steps-from-home-step-2

Step 3: https://frozen-well-studios.itch.io/five-steps-from-home

Step 4: https://punkpebblestudio.itch.io/five-steps-level-4

Step 5: https://marlin-media.itch.io/5-steps-from-home-the-final-step

See the devlog here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgavhR3F8gxYBwp2HFtRR0Q

The  Other Devs:

Step 4: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMR5qS7_BlPM2zSb9sh6WmA

Step 5: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCi1pYAxtZVT07HijYND8Dpg

Are you a game dev? Do you have a youtube channel? Do you want to collab on a future video? Let me know in the comments of my youtube video.
